meanings: as compared with the corresponding period of last year

examples.korean: She distrusted his motives for wanting to see her again. 발음듣기 그녀는 자기를 다시 만나고 싶어 하는 그의 동기를 불신했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She distrusted his motives for wanting to see her again. 발음
